channel.title: Adaptability on stultus notes
channel.description: Recent content in Adaptability on stultus notes

item.title: Adaptability
item.description: The ability to adjust to new conditions and circumstances.

item.title: Resilience
item.description: The ability to recover from setbacks and adapt to adversity.

item.title: Flexibility Over Rigidity
item.description: Resilience comes from flexibility, not rigidity - like redwoods that bend with the wind.
